abstract.t: PMIPv6 allows multiple Local Mobility Anchors(LMA) to exist in a PMIPv6 domain, it MAY cause that different interfaces of a mobile node(MN) are anchored to different LMAs. In this document, we propose to discuss how to support flow mobility in multi-LMA environment. Among the discussed scenarios, The scenario of different interfaces with different MAGs in multi-LMA environment cannot use traditional ways to realize flow mobility to an existing interface.
